mapper.select: SELECT u.username FROM sys_users u JOIN sys_user_roles ur ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE ur.role_id = 3;
mapper.insert: insert into sys_reimburse (reimburseId, title, money, type, project, comment, bill, createdUser, createdTime, modifiedUser) values (#{entity.reimburseId}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.project}, #{entity.comment}, #{entity.bill}, #{entity.createdUser}, now(), #{entity.modifiedUser})
